name: Kat
visual_description: A blonde young woman with fair skin and an oval face. Her shoulder-length blonde hair is styled in soft waves. She has blue eyes with long eyelashes, an average build, and appears to be of average height. She has no visible distinctive features.
physical_description: A young adult woman with an oval face, feminine features, and light skin tone with European characteristics. She has blue eyes. Her shoulder-length wavy blonde hair has dark roots. She appears to be of average height with a curvy build.
face_description: Oval face with feminine features, blue eyes, and European characteristics. Full lips and arched eyebrows.
hair_description: Shoulder-length wavy blonde hair with dark roots.
